item.content: Plums will grow in this area, but European types are suggested over Japanese types and hybrids.
Plant any two of these European types for cross-pollination. The most serious problem on plums in our area is black knot disease, which is difficult to control.
Many gardeners are interested in fruit trees, but are often unaware of which species will do well in northern Illinois and also the amount of work involved in growing tree fruit.
